title: Set Up a Product Bundle
description: A merchandiser wants to create a 'Starter Kit' bundle that includes three separate products sold together at a discounted price.

tasks.description: Create a new virtual product for the bundle.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new SKU for the 'Starter Kit'.

tasks.description: Link the three component SKUs to the bundle product.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly associates the individual products with the bundle.

tasks.description: Set a special bundle price that is lower than the sum of the individual items.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets the discounted price for the bundle.

tasks.description: Ensure that when a bundle is sold, the inventory for each component product is reduced.
tasks.expected_outcome: System is configured to correctly decrement inventory for bundled items.
